//     the code is regenerated.

/* eslint-disable */
import { Injectable } from '@angular/core';
import { BehaviorSubject, Subject } from 'rxjs';


@Injectable({
  providedIn: 'root'
})
export class FormLookupService {
	private _getFormStatusFixedValues = [
		{ value: 0, displayName: 'First' },
		{ value: 1, displayName: 'Second' },
		{ value: 2, displayName: 'Third' },
	];

    private _getMockRadioFixedValues = [
		{ value: 0, displayName: 'First' },
		{ value: 1, displayName: 'Second' },
		{ value: 2, displayName: 'Third' },
	];

	private _getFormStatus = new BehaviorSubject<any[]>(this._getFormStatusFixedValues);
	private _getMockRadio = new BehaviorSubject<any[]>(this._getMockRadioFixedValues);

	getFormStatus$ = this._getFormStatus.asObservable();
	getMockRadio$ = this._getMockRadio.asObservable();

    constructor() { }

    initLookups(response: any) {
    }

	displayOption(option: any): string { return option ? option.displayName : ''; }

	getFormStatus(keyword: string) {
		this._getFormStatus.next(this._getFormStatusFixedValues
			.filter(x => x.displayName.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase())));
	}

    getMockRadio(keyword: string) {
		this._getMockRadio.next(this._getMockRadioFixedValues
			.filter(x => x.displayName.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase())));
	}

	getFormStatusDisplayOption(value: any) {
		return value !== undefined ? this._getFormStatusFixedValues
			.find(x => x.value === value)?.displayName : '';
	}

    getMockRadioDisplayOption(value: any) {
		return value !== undefined ? this._getMockRadioFixedValues
			.find(x => x.value === value)?.displayName : '';
	}

}
